column.name: guid
column.Comment: UUID generated in code and stored as binary

column.name: name
column.Comment: The name of the batch for programmatic use

column.name: title
column.Comment: The title of the batch for display purposes

column.name: has_started
column.Comment: Whether this batch has started or not

column.name: is_running
column.Comment: Whether this batch currently has a worker running it

column.name: assume_dead_after
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the batch is to be assumed dead and picked up by another worker

column.name: assume_dead_after_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone assume_dead_after was set with

column.name: initial_assume_dead_after
column.Comment: The datetime representation of the initial value for when the batch is to be assumed dead and picked up by another worker

column.name: initial_assume_dead_after_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone initial_assume_dead_after was set with

column.name: is_finished
column.Comment: Whether this batch has finished or not

column.name: finished_due_to_error
column.Comment: Whether this batch was marked finished do to an error

column.name: error_message
column.Comment: If error message, it will be added to this column

column.name: percent_complete
column.Comment: The percentage of the batch completed

column.name: added_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the batch was added

column.name: added_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone added_at was set with

column.name: finished_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the batch was finished

column.name: finished_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone finished_at was set with

column.name: context
column.Comment: Not using JSON column type because of broad compatibility issues

column.name: guid
column.Comment: UUID generated in code and stored as binary

column.name: action_queue_batch_guid
column.Comment: Associated batch UUID stored as binary

column.name: order_to_run
column.Comment: The order in which the items in this batch should run

column.name: is_finished
column.Comment: Whether this batch has finished or not

column.name: finished_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the item was finished

column.name: finished_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone finished_at was set with

column.name: class
column.Comment: The class that this item will use to run

column.name: method
column.Comment: The method on the class that this item will use to run

column.name: context
column.Comment: Not using JSON column type because of broad compatibility issues

column.name: guid
column.Comment: UUID generated in code and stored as binary

column.name: name
column.Comment: Flash Data name

column.name: data
column.Comment: Flash Data stored as JSON

column.name: added_at

column.name: added_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone added_at was set with

column.name: guid
column.Comment: UUID generated in code and stored as binary

column.name: monitored_url_guid
column.Comment: UUID generated in code and stored as binary

column.name: event_type
column.Comment: Up or down or pending at initial writing of app

column.name: status_code
column.Comment: The status code returned by the URL

column.name: message
column.Comment: The message returned from the URL

column.name: event_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the event occurred

column.name: event_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone event_at was set with

column.name: last_notification_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the last notification was sent

column.name: last_notification_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone last_notification_at was set with

column.name: guid
column.Comment: UUID generated in code and stored as binary

column.name: project_guid
column.Comment: Associated project UUID stored as binary

column.name: is_active
column.Comment: Determines whether the project is active or archived

column.name: title
column.Comment: The project title

column.name: slug
column.Comment: The project slug (code should ensure uniqueness)

column.name: url
column.Comment: Url to monitor

column.name: pending_error
column.Comment: If an error was detected on check for the first time, status will be pending

column.name: has_error
column.Comment: If an error is detected a second time after pending, monitored URL has an error

column.name: checked_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the URL was last checked

column.name: checked_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone checked_at was set with

column.name: added_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the projected was added

column.name: added_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone added_at was set with

column.name: guid
column.Comment: UUID generated in code and stored as binary

column.name: is_active
column.Comment: Determines whether this email address is currently receiving notifications

column.name: email_address
column.Comment: Address to send notification to

column.name: guid
column.Comment: UUID generated in code and stored as binary

column.name: project_guid
column.Comment: Associated project UUID stored as binary

column.name: ping_id
column.Comment: The ping ID which will be used in URLs

column.name: is_active
column.Comment: Determines whether the project is active or archived

column.name: title
column.Comment: The project title

column.name: slug
column.Comment: The project slug (code should ensure uniqueness)

column.name: pending_error
column.Comment: Set if a checkin is overdue

column.name: has_error
column.Comment: Set if a checkin is over and past the warn_after setting

column.name: expect_every
column.Comment: Time in minutes to expect the checkin

column.name: warn_after
column.Comment: Time in minutes to warn after overdue

column.name: last_ping_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the checkin last happened

column.name: last_ping_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone last_ping_at was set with

column.name: last_notification_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the down notification was last sent

column.name: last_notification_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone last_notification_at was set with

column.name: added_at
column.Comment: The datetime representation of when the ping was added

column.name: added_at_time_zone
column.Comment: The timezone added_at was set with

column.Comment: Associated pipeline item UUID stored as binary

column.name: server_guid
column.Comment: Associated sever UUID stored as binary

column.Comment: Whether this item should run even after batch failure
